moves.name: None
moves.description: None

moves.name: Absorb
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Acid
moves.description: The opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Acid Armor
moves.description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Acid Spray
moves.description: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Acrobatics
moves.description: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.

moves.name: Acupressure
moves.description: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its or its allies’ stats.

moves.name: Aerial Ace
moves.description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Aeroblast
moves.description: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: After You
moves.description: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.

moves.name: Air Cutter
moves.description: The user launches razor-like wind to slash the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Air Slash
moves.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Ally Switch
moves.description: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies.

moves.name: Amnesia
moves.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Ancient Power
moves.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. This may also raise all the user's stats at once.

moves.name: Aqua Jet
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Aqua Ring
moves.description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.

moves.name: Aqua Tail
moves.description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

moves.name: Arm Thrust
moves.description: The user lets loose a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Aromatherapy
moves.description: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user’s party.

moves.name: Aromatic Mist
moves.description: The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.

moves.name: Assist
moves.description: The user hurriedly and randomly uses a move among those known by other Pokémon in the party.

moves.name: Assurance
moves.description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

moves.name: Astonish
moves.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Attack Order
moves.description: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Attract
moves.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

moves.name: Aura Sphere
moves.description: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Aurora Beam
moves.description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Autotomize
moves.description: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.

moves.name: Avalanche
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn.

moves.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
moves.description: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Barrage
moves.description: Round objects are hurled at the target to strike two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Barrier
moves.description: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

moves.name: Baton Pass
moves.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.

moves.name: Beat Up
moves.description: The user gets all party Pokémon to attack the target. The more party Pokémon, the greater the number of attacks.

moves.name: Belch
moves.description: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

moves.name: Belly Drum
moves.description: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.

moves.name: Bestow
moves.description: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn't holding an item.

moves.name: Bide
moves.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

moves.name: Bind
moves.description: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

moves.name: Bite
moves.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Blast Burn
moves.description: The target is razed by a fiery explosion. The user can’t move on the next turn.

moves.name: Blaze Kick
moves.description: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.

moves.name: Block
moves.description: The user blocks the target’s way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.

moves.name: Blue Flare
moves.description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Bolt Strike
moves.description: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of electricity and charges its target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Bone Club
moves.description: The user clubs the target with a bone. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Bone Rush
moves.description: The user strikes the target with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Bonemerang
moves.description: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops to hit the target twice, coming and going.

moves.name: Boomburst
moves.description: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound.

moves.name: Bounce
moves.description: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target on the second turn. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Brave Bird
moves.description: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.description: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

moves.name: Brine
moves.description: If the target’s HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.

moves.name: Bubble
moves.description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their Speed stats.

moves.name: Bubble Beam
moves.description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower its Speed stat.

moves.name: Bug Bite
moves.description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

moves.name: Bug Buzz
moves.description: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Bulk Up
moves.description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.

moves.name: Bulldoze
moves.description: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of those hit.

moves.name: Bullet Punch
moves.description: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Bullet Seed
moves.description: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Calm Mind
moves.description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Camouflage
moves.description: The user's type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water's edge, in grass, or in a cave.

moves.name: Captivate
moves.description: If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite gender of the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Celebrate
moves.description: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day!

moves.name: Charge
moves.description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. This also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Charge Beam
moves.description: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Charm
moves.description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers its Attack stat.

moves.name: Chatter
moves.description: The user attacks using a sound wave based on words it has learned. This confuses the target.

moves.name: Chip Away
moves.description: Looking for an opening, the user strikes consistently. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

moves.name: Circle Throw
moves.description: The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

moves.name: Clamp
moves.description: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user’s very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

moves.name: Clear Smog
moves.description: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are returned to normal.

moves.name: Close Combat
moves.description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Coil
moves.description: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

moves.name: Comet Punch
moves.description: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Confide
moves.description: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. This may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Constrict
moves.description: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. This may also lower the target's Speed stat.

moves.name: Conversion
moves.description: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.

moves.name: Conversion 2
moves.description: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack the opponent used last.

moves.name: Copycat
moves.description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

moves.name: Cosmic Power
moves.description: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Cotton Guard
moves.description: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, which drastically raises the user’s Defense stat.

moves.name: Cotton Spore
moves.description: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the opposing Pokémon, which harshly lowers their Speed stats.

moves.name: Counter
moves.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

moves.name: Covet
moves.description: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.

moves.name: Crabhammer
moves.description: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Crafty Shield
moves.description: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.

moves.name: Cross Chop
moves.description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Cross Poison
moves.description: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Crush Claw
moves.description: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

moves.name: Crush Grip
moves.description: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater this move’s power.

moves.name: Curse
moves.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

moves.name: Cut
moves.description: The target is cut with a scythe or claw. This can also be used to cut down thin trees.

moves.name: Dark Pulse
moves.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Dark Void
moves.description: Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total darkness that makes them sleep.

moves.name: Dazzling Gleam
moves.description: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

moves.name: Defend Order
moves.description: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Defense Curl
moves.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Defog
moves.description: A strong wind blows away the target's barriers such as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the targe's evasiveness.

moves.name: Destiny Bond
moves.description: When this move is used, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints.

moves.name: Detect
moves.description: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Diamond Storm
moves.description: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also raise the user’s Defense stat.

moves.name: Dig
moves.description: The user burrows, then attacks on the next turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.

moves.name: Disable
moves.description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

moves.name: Disarming Voice
moves.description: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Discharge
moves.description: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity, This may also cause paralysis.

moves.name: Dive
moves.description: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the next turn.

moves.name: Dizzy Punch
moves.description: The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches. This may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Doom Desire
moves.description: Two turns after this move is used, the user blasts the target with a concentrated bundle of light.

moves.name: Double Hit
moves.description: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or a tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

moves.name: Double Kick
moves.description: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

moves.name: Double Slap
moves.description: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.

moves.name: Draco Meteor
moves.description: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Dragon Ascent
moves.description: After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by dropping out of the sky at high speeds, although it lowers its own Defense and Sp. Def in the process.

moves.name: Dragon Breath
moves.description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Dragon Claw
moves.description: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws.

moves.name: Dragon Dance
moves.description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.

moves.name: Dragon Pulse
moves.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user’s gaping mouth.

moves.name: Dragon Rage
moves.description: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

moves.name: Dragon Rush
moves.description: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Dragon Tail
moves.description: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

moves.name: Drain Punch
moves.description: An energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Draining Kiss
moves.description: The user steals the target's energy with a kiss. The users HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Dream Eater
moves.description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.

moves.name: Drill Peck
moves.description: A corkscrewing attack with a sharp beak acting as a drill.

moves.name: Drill Run
moves.description: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Dual Chop
moves.description: The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

moves.name: Dynamic Punch
moves.description: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. This confuses the target if it hits.

moves.name: Earth Power
moves.description: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

moves.name: Echoed Voice
moves.description: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, it does greater damage.

moves.name: Eerie Impulse
moves.description: The user's body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Egg Bomb
moves.description: A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum force to inflict damage.

moves.name: Electric Terrain
moves.description: The user electrifies the ground under everyone’s feet for five turns. Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.

moves.name: Electrify
moves.description: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target's move becomes Electric type.

moves.name: Electro Ball
moves.description: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: Electroweb
moves.description: The user attacks and captures opposing Pokémon using an electric net. This lowers their Speed stat.

moves.name: Embargo
moves.description: This move prevents the target from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

moves.name: Ember
moves.description: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Encore
moves.description: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.

moves.name: Endeavor
moves.description: An attack move that cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP.

moves.name: Endure
moves.description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Energy Ball
moves.description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

moves.name: Entrainment
moves.description: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability the same as the user’s.

moves.name: Eruption
moves.description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with explosive fury. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.

moves.name: Explosion
moves.description: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using the move.

moves.name: Extrasensory
moves.description: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Extreme Speed
moves.description: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Facade
moves.description: An attack move that doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or has paralysis.

moves.name: Fairy Lock
moves.description: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn.

moves.name: Fairy Wind
moves.description: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.

moves.name: Fake Out
moves.description: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

moves.name: Fake Tears
moves.description: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: False Swipe
moves.description: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

moves.name: Feather Dance
moves.description: The user covers the target's body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

moves.name: Feint
moves.description: An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.

moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Fell Stinger
moves.description: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user’s Attack stat rises sharply.

moves.name: Fiery Dance
moves.description: Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its wings. This may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Final Gambit
moves.description: The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to its HP.

moves.name: Fire Blast
moves.description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Fire Fang
moves.description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.

moves.name: Fire Pledge
moves.description: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass equivalent, its damage increases and a vast sea of fire appears.

moves.name: Fire Punch
moves.description: The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Fire Spin
moves.description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

moves.name: Fissure
moves.description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

moves.name: Flail
moves.description: The user flails aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: Flame Burst
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.

moves.name: Flame Charge
moves.description: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then, building up more power, the user raises its Speed stat.

moves.name: Flame Wheel
moves.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Flare Blitz
moves.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This may leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Flash
moves.description: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Flash Cannon
moves.description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Flatter
moves.description: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also raises the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Fling
moves.description: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. This move's power and effects depend on the item.

moves.name: Flower Shield
moves.description: The user raises the Defense stat of all Grass-type Pokémon in battle with a mysterious power.

moves.name: Fly
moves.description: The user soars and then strikes its target on the next turn. This can also be used to fly to any familiar town.

moves.name: Flying Press
moves.description: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

moves.name: Focus Blast
moves.description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Focus Punch
moves.description: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. This move fails if the user is hit before it is used.

moves.name: Follow Me
moves.description: The user draws attention to itself, making all targets take aim only at the user.

moves.name: Force Palm
moves.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Foresight
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Forest's Curse
moves.description: The user puts a forest curse on the target. Afflicted targets are now Grass type as well.

moves.name: Foul Play
moves.description: The user turns the target's power against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the move’s power.

moves.name: Freeze Shock
moves.description: On the second turn, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Freeze-Dry
moves.description: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.

moves.name: Frenzy Plant
moves.description: The user slams the target with an enormous tree. The user can’t move on the next turn.

moves.name: Frost Breath
moves.description: The user blows its cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.description: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.

moves.name: Fury Attack
moves.description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Fury Cutter
moves.description: The target is slashed with scythes or claws. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.

moves.name: Fury Swipes
moves.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes quickly two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Fusion Bolt
moves.description: The user throws down a giant thunderbolt. This move is more powerful when influenced by an enormous flame.

moves.name: Fusion Flare
moves.description: The user brings down a giant flame. This move is more powerful when influenced by an enormous thunderbolt.

moves.name: Future Sight
moves.description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

moves.name: Gastro Acid
moves.description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.

moves.name: Gear Grind
moves.description: The user attacks by throwing steel gears at its target twice.

moves.name: Geomancy
moves.description: The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Giga Impact
moves.description: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can’t move on the next turn.

moves.name: Glaciate
moves.description: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This lowers their Speed stat.

moves.name: Glare
moves.description: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

moves.name: Grass Knot
moves.description: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: Grass Pledge
moves.description: A column of grass hits the target. When used with its water equivalent, its damage increases and a vast swamp appears.

moves.name: Grass Whistle
moves.description: The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the target into a deep sleep.

moves.name: Grassy Terrain
moves.description: The user turns the ground under everyone's feet to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn.

moves.name: Gravity
moves.description: Gravity is intensified for five turns, making moves involving flying unusable and negating Levitate.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.

moves.name: Growth
moves.description: The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

moves.name: Grudge
moves.description: If the user faints, the user's grudge fully depletes the PP of the opponent’s move that knocked it out.

moves.name: Guard Split
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.

moves.name: Guard Swap
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with the target.

moves.name: Guillotine
moves.description: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

moves.name: Gunk Shot
moves.description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Gust
moves.description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Gyro Ball
moves.description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: Hail
moves.description: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

moves.name: Hammer Arm
moves.description: The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.

moves.name: Happy Hour
moves.description: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle.

moves.name: Harden
moves.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its defense stat.

moves.name: Haze
moves.description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

moves.name: Head Charge
moves.description: The user charges its head into its target, using its powerful guard hair. This also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Head Smash
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. This also damages the user terribly.

moves.name: Headbutt
moves.description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Heal Bell
moves.description: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status conditions of all the party Pokémon.

moves.name: Heal Block
moves.description: For five turns, the user prevents the opposing team from using any moves, Abilities, or held items that recover HP.

moves.name: Heal Order
moves.description: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: Heal Pulse
moves.description: The user emits a healing pulse which restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: Healing Wish
moves.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status conditions cured.

moves.name: Heart Stamp
moves.description: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the target less wary. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Heart Swap
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the target.

moves.name: Heat Crash
moves.description: The user slams its target with its flame-covered body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move’s power.

moves.name: Heat Wave
moves.description: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing Pokémon. This may also leave those Pokémon with a burn.

moves.name: Heavy Slam
moves.description: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move’s power.

moves.name: Helping Hand
moves.description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally's attack.

moves.name: Hex
moves.description: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status conditions.

moves.name: Hidden Power
moves.description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the Pokémon using it.

moves.name: High Jump Kick
moves.description: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

moves.name: Hold Back
moves.description: The user holds back when it attacks and the target is left with at least 1 HP.

moves.name: Hold Hands
moves.description: The user and an ally hold hands. This makes them very happy.

moves.name: Hone Claws
moves.description: The user sharpens its claws to to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

moves.name: Horn Attack
moves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

moves.name: Horn Drill
moves.description: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

moves.name: Horn Leech
moves.description: The user drains the target's energy with its horns. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Howl
moves.description: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, which raises its Attack stat.

moves.name: Hurricane
moves.description: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Hydro Cannon
moves.description: The target is hit with a watery blast. The user can't move on the next turn.

moves.name: Hydro Pump
moves.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.

moves.name: Hyper Fang
moves.description: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Hyper Voice
moves.description: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

moves.name: Hypnosis
moves.description: The users employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

moves.name: Ice Ball
moves.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

moves.name: Ice Burn
moves.description: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Ice Fang
moves.description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

moves.name: Ice Punch
moves.description: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.

moves.name: Ice Shard
moves.description: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Icicle Crash
moves.description: The user attacks by harshly dropping large icicles onto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Icicle Spear
moves.description: The user launches sharp icicles at the target two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Icy Wind
moves.description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers the opposing Pokémon's Speed stats.

moves.name: Imprison
moves.description: If opposing Pokémon know any move also known by the user, they are prevented from using it.

moves.name: Incinerate
moves.description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

moves.name: Inferno
moves.description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

moves.name: Infestation
moves.description: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can't flee during this time.

moves.name: Ingrain
moves.description: The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn. Because it is rooted, it can't switch out.

moves.name: Ion Deluge
moves.description: The user disperses electrically charged particles, which changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

moves.name: Iron Defense
moves.description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Iron Head
moves.description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Iron Tail
moves.description: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

moves.name: Judgment
moves.description: The user releases countless shots of light at the target. This move's type varies depending on the kind of Plate the user is holding.

moves.name: Jump Kick
moves.description: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

moves.name: Karate Chop
moves.description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Kinesis
moves.description: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. This lowers the target's accuracy.

moves.name: King's Shield
moves.description: The user takes a defensive stance while it protects itself from damage. It also harshly lowers the Attack stat of any attacker who makes direct

moves.name: Knock Off
moves.description: The user slaps down the target's held item, and that item can't be used in that battle. The move does more damage if the target has a held item.

moves.name: Land's Wrath
moves.description: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.

moves.name: Last Resort
moves.description: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

moves.name: Lava Plume
moves.description: The user torches everything around it with an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those hit with a burn.

moves.name: Leaf Blade
moves.description: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Leaf Storm
moves.description: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Leaf Tornado
moves.description: The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp leaves. This attack may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Leech Life
moves.description: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Leech Seed
moves.description: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers the Defense stat.

moves.name: Lick
moves.description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.description: A wonderous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Lock-On
moves.description: The user takes sure aim at the target. This ensures the next attack does not miss the target.

moves.name: Lovely Kiss
moves.description: With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

moves.name: Low Kick
moves.description: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: Low Sweep
moves.description: The user makes a swift attack on the target's legs, which lowers the target's Speed stat.

moves.name: Lucky Chant
moves.description: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits.

moves.name: Lunar Dance
moves.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.

moves.name: Luster Purge
moves.description: The user lets loose a damaging burst of light. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Mach Punch
moves.description: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Magic Coat
moves.description: A barrier reflects back to the target moves like Leech Seed and moves that damage status.

moves.name: Magic Room
moves.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose their effects for five turns.

moves.name: Magical Leaf
moves.description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Magma Storm
moves.description: The target becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for four to five turns.

moves.name: Magnet Bomb
moves.description: The user launches steel bombs that stick to the target. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Magnet Rise
moves.description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

moves.name: Magnetic Flux
moves.description: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

moves.name: Magnitude
moves.description: The user attacks everything around it with a ground-shaking quake. Its power varies.

moves.name: Mat Block
moves.description: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does not stop status moves.

moves.name: Me First
moves.description: Anwender stiehlt und führt die Attacke eines langsameren Zieles zuerst und mit größerer Kraft aus.

moves.name: Mean Look
moves.description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

moves.name: Meditate
moves.description: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

moves.name: Mega Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Mega Kick
moves.description: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

moves.name: Mega Punch
moves.description: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

moves.name: Megahorn
moves.description: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

moves.name: Memento
moves.description: The user faints when using this move. In return, this harshly lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

moves.name: Metal Burst
moves.description: The user retaliates with much greater power against the target that last inflicted damage on it.

moves.name: Metal Claw
moves.description: The target is raked with steel claws. This may also raise the user’s Attack stat.

moves.name: Metal Sound
moves.description: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Meteor Mash
moves.description: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise the user's Attack stat.

moves.name: Metronome
moves.description: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

moves.name: Milk Drink
moves.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP. May also be used in the field to heal HP.

moves.name: Mimic
moves.description: The user copies the target's last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.

moves.name: Mind Reader
moves.description: The user senses the target's movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss the target.

moves.name: Minimize
moves.description: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.

moves.name: Miracle Eye
moves.description: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by Psychic-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Mirror Coat
moves.description: A relitation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

moves.name: Mirror Move
moves.description: The user counters the target by mimicking the target's last move.

moves.name: Mirror Shot
moves.description: The user lets loose a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

moves.name: Mist
moves.description: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.

moves.name: Mist Ball
moves.description: A mist-like flurry of down envelops and damages the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Misty Terrain
moves.description: The user covers the ground under everyone's feet with mist for five turns. This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions.

moves.name: Moonblast
moves.description: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Moonlight
moves.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

moves.name: Morning Sun
moves.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

moves.name: Mud Bomb
moves.description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Mud Shot
moves.description: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. This may also lowers the target's Speed stat.

moves.name: Mud Sport
moves.description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

moves.name: Muddy Water
moves.description: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their accuracy.

moves.name: Mystical Fire
moves.description: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Nasty Plot
moves.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Natural Gift
moves.description: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines the move's type and power.

moves.name: Nature Power
moves.description: An attack that makes use of nature's power. Its effects vary depending on the user's environment.

moves.name: Needle Arm
moves.description: The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Night Daze
moves.description: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Night Shade
moves.description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Night Slash
moves.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Nightmare
moves.description: A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn.

moves.name: Noble Roar
moves.description: Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the target and lowers its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

moves.name: Nuzzle
moves.description: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Oblivion Wing
moves.description: The user absorbs its target's HP. The user's HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Octazooka
moves.description: The user attacks by spraying ink in the target's face or eyes. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Odor Sleuth
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Ominous Wind
moves.description: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. This may also raise all the user's stats at once.

moves.name: Origin Pulse
moves.description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

moves.name: Outrage
moves.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

moves.name: Overheat
moves.description: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Pain Split
moves.description: The user adds its HP to the target's HP, then equally shares the combined HP with the target.

moves.name: Parabolic Charge
moves.description: The user attacks everything around it. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

moves.name: Parting Shot
moves.description: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party Pokémon.

moves.name: Pay Day
moves.description: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.

moves.name: Payback
moves.description: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

moves.name: Peck
moves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

moves.name: Perish Song
moves.description: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

moves.name: Petal Blizzard
moves.description: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.

moves.name: Petal Dance
moves.description: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

moves.name: Phantom Force
moves.description: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

moves.name: Pin Missile
moves.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Play Nice
moves.description: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Play Rough
moves.description: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Pluck
moves.description: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

moves.name: Poison Fang
moves.description: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.

moves.name: Poison Gas
moves.description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon. This may also poison those hit.

moves.name: Poison Jab
moves.description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Poison Powder
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust on the target. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Poison Sting
moves.description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Poison Tail
moves.description: The user hits the target with its tail. This may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Pound
moves.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

moves.name: Powder
moves.description: The user covers the target in a powder that explodes and damages the target if it uses a Fire-type move.

moves.name: Powder Snow
moves.description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also freeze the opposing Pokémon.

moves.name: Power Gem
moves.description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

moves.name: Power Split
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.

moves.name: Power Swap
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with the target.

moves.name: Power Trick
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack with its Defense stat.

moves.name: Power Whip
moves.description: The user violently whirls its vines or tentacles to harshly lash the target.

moves.name: Power-Up Punch
moves.description: Striking oppontents over and over makes the user's fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

moves.name: Precipice Blades
moves.description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

moves.name: Present
moves.description: The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a hidden trap. It restores HP sometimes, however.

moves.name: Protect
moves.description: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Psych Up
moves.description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Psycho Boost
moves.description: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Psycho Cut
moves.description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Psycho Shift
moves.description: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target.

moves.name: Psyshock
moves.description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

moves.name: Psystrike
moves.description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

moves.name: Psywave
moves.description: The target is attacked with an odd psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.

moves.name: Punishment
moves.description: The more the target has powered up with stat changes, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: Pursuit
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

moves.name: Quash
moves.description: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Quick Guard
moves.description: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.

moves.name: Quiver Dance
moves.description: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user’s Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

moves.name: Rage
moves.description: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.

moves.name: Rage Powder
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves.

moves.name: Rapid Spin
moves.description: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

moves.name: Razor Leaf
moves.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Razor Shell
moves.description: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Razor Wind
moves.description: A two-turn attack. Blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Recover
moves.description: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

moves.name: Recycle
moves.description: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.description: A wonderous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Reflect Type
moves.description: The user reflects the target's type, making it the same type as the target.

moves.name: Refresh
moves.description: The user rests to cure itself of a poisoning, burn, or paralysis.

moves.name: Relic Song
moves.description: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.

moves.name: Rest
moves.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user's HP and heals any status conditions.

moves.name: Retaliate
moves.description: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this move becomes more powerful.

moves.name: Return
moves.description: A full power attack that grows more powerful the more the user likes its trainer.

moves.name: Revenge
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

moves.name: Reversal
moves.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

moves.name: Roar
moves.description: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

moves.name: Roar of Time
moves.description: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user can’t move on the next turn.

moves.name: Rock Blast
moves.description: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in a row.

moves.name: Rock Climb
moves.description: The user attacks the target by smashing into it with incredible force. This may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Rock Polish
moves.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This can sharply raise the Speed stat.

moves.name: Rock Slide
moves.description: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.

moves.name: Rock Smash
moves.description: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target's Defense stat. This move can also shatter rocks in the field.

moves.name: Rock Throw
moves.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

moves.name: Rock Tomb
moves.description: Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat by preventing its movement.

moves.name: Rock Wrecker
moves.description: The user launches a huge boulder at the target to attack. The user can't move on the next turn.

moves.name: Role Play
moves.description: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target's natural Ability.

moves.name: Rolling Kick
moves.description: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.

moves.name: Roost
moves.description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: Rototiller
moves.description: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.

moves.name: Round
moves.description: The user attacks with a song. Others can join in the Round and make the attack do greater damage.

moves.name: Sacred Fire
moves.description: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Sacred Sword
moves.description: The user attacks by slicing with a long horn. The target's stat changes don’t affect this attack's damage.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Sand Tomb
moves.description: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for four to five turns.

moves.name: Sandstorm
moves.description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except for Rock, Ground, and Steel types.

moves.name: Scald
moves.description: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Scary Face
moves.description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.

moves.name: Scratch
moves.description: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: An earsplitting screen harshly lowers the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Searing Shot
moves.description: The user torches everything around it with an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those hit with a burn.

moves.name: Secret Power
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a secret power. Its additional effects vary depending on the user’s environment.

moves.name: Secret Sword
moves.description: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn does physical damage to the target.

moves.name: Seed Bomb
moves.description: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

moves.name: Seed Flare
moves.description: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack its target. This may also harshly lower the target's Sp. Def.

moves.name: Seismic Toss
moves.description: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Self-Destruct
moves.description: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Shadow Claw
moves.description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Shadow Force
moves.description: The user disappears, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

moves.name: Shadow Punch
moves.description: The user throws a punch from the shadows. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Shadow Sneak
moves.description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Sharpen
moves.description: The user lowers its polygon count to make itself more jagged, raising the Attack stat.

moves.name: Sheer Cold
moves.description: The target is attacked with a blast of absolute-zero cold. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

moves.name: Shell Smash
moves.description: The user breaks its shell, which lowers Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raises its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

moves.name: Shift Gear
moves.description: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack and sharply raising its Speed.

moves.name: Shock Wave
moves.description: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Signal Beam
moves.description: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. This may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Silver Wind
moves.description: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. This may also raise all the user's stats.

moves.name: Simple Beam
moves.description: The user's mysterious psychic wave changes the target's Ability to Simple.

moves.name: Sing
moves.description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

moves.name: Sketch
moves.description: It enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the target. Once used, Sketch disappears.

moves.name: Skill Swap
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.

moves.name: Skull Bash
moves.description: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense in the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.

moves.name: Sky Attack
moves.description: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Sky Drop
moves.description: The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky.

moves.name: Sky Uppercut
moves.description: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

moves.name: Slack Off
moves.description: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: Slam
moves.description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.

moves.name: Slash
moves.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Sleep Powder
moves.description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.description: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

moves.name: Sludge
moves.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Sludge Bomb
moves.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Sludge Wave
moves.description: The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also poison those hit.

moves.name: Smack Down
moves.description: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when it's hit.

moves.name: Smelling Salts
moves.description: This attack inflicts double damage on a target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s paralysis, however.

moves.name: Smog
moves.description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Smokescreen
moves.description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target’s accuracy.

moves.name: Snarl
moves.description: The user yells as if it’s ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stat of opposing Pokémon.

moves.name: Snatch
moves.description: The user steals the effects of any attempts to use a healing or stat-changing move.

moves.name: Snore
moves.description: An attack that can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Soak
moves.description: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target's type to Water.

moves.name: Soft-Boiled
moves.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP. May also be used in the field to heal HP.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.description: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

moves.name: Sonic Boom
moves.description: The target is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage.

moves.name: Spacial Rend
moves.description: The user tears the target along with the space around it. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Spark
moves.description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Spider Web
moves.description: The user ensnares the target with thin, gooey silk so it can’t flee from battle.

moves.name: Spike Cannon
moves.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Spikes
moves.description: The user lays a trap of spikes at the opposing team's feet. The trap hurts Pokémon that switch into battle.

moves.name: Spiky Shield
moves.description: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker who makes direct contact.

moves.name: Spit Up
moves.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack. The more power is stored, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: Spite
moves.description: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

moves.name: Splash
moves.description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

moves.name: Spore
moves.description: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

moves.name: Stealth Rock
moves.description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon that swith into battle.

moves.name: Steam Eruption
moves.description: The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Steamroller
moves.description: The user crushes its targets by rolling over them with its rolled-up body. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Steel Wing
moves.description: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also raise the user's Defense stat.

moves.name: Sticky Web
moves.description: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching into battle.

moves.name: Stockpile
moves.description: The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def stats. The move can be used three times.

moves.name: Stomp
moves.description: The target is stomped with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Stone Edge
moves.description: The user stabs the target with sharpened stones from below. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Stored Power
moves.description: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the move’s power.

moves.name: Storm Throw
moves.description: The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

moves.name: Strength
moves.description: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power. This can also be used to move heavy boulders.

moves.name: String Shot
moves.description: The opposing Pokémon are bound with silk blown from the user's mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.

moves.name: Struggle
moves.description: An attack that is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. This also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Struggle Bug
moves.description: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stat of those hit.

moves.name: Stun Spore
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

moves.name: Submission
moves.description: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.description: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user's decoy.

moves.name: Sucker Punch
moves.description: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.

moves.name: Super Fang
moves.description: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target's HP in half.

moves.name: Superpower
moves.description: The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user's Attack and Defense stats.

moves.name: Supersonic
moves.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.

moves.name: Surf
moves.description: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave. This can also be used for crossing water.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Swallow
moves.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more power heals more HP.

moves.name: Sweet Kiss
moves.description: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

moves.name: Sweet Scent
moves.description: A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokémon's evasiveness. This also lures wild Pokémon if used in places such as tall gras

moves.name: Swift
moves.description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Switcheroo
moves.description: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

moves.name: Swords Dance
moves.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

moves.name: Synchronoise
moves.description: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.

moves.name: Synthesis
moves.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Tail Glow
moves.description: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, drastically raising its Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Tail Slap
moves.description: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Tail Whip
moves.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

moves.name: Tailwind
moves.description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Taunt
moves.description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

moves.name: Techno Blast
moves.description: The user fires a beam of light at its target. The move's type changes depending on the Drive the user holds.

moves.name: Teeter Dance
moves.description: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses the Pokémon around it.

moves.name: Telekinesis
moves.description: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.

moves.name: Teleport
moves.description: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. It can also warp to the last Pokémon Center visited.

moves.name: Thief
moves.description: The user attacks and steals the target's held item simultaneously. The user can't steal anything if it already holds an item.

moves.name: Thrash
moves.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

moves.name: Thunder
moves.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Thunder Fang
moves.description: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

moves.name: Thunder Punch
moves.description: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Thunder Shock
moves.description: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.description: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

moves.name: Thunderbolt
moves.description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Tickle
moves.description: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

moves.name: Topsy-Turvy
moves.description: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.

moves.name: Torment
moves.description: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

moves.name: Toxic Spikes
moves.description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the opposing team’s feet. They poison opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

moves.name: Transform
moves.description: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.

moves.name: Tri Attack
moves.description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Trick
moves.description: The user catches the target off guard and swaps its held item with its own.

moves.name: Trick Room
moves.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

moves.name: Trick-or-Treat
moves.description: The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to the target’s type.

moves.name: Triple Kick
moves.description: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.

moves.name: Trump Card
moves.description: The fewer PP this move has, the greater its power.

moves.name: Twineedle
moves.description: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Twister
