moves.description: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

moves.name: U-turn
moves.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

moves.name: Uproar
moves.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: V-create
moves.description: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. This lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

moves.name: Vacuum Wave
moves.description: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Venom Drench
moves.description: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.

moves.name: Venoshock
moves.description: THe user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move's power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

moves.name: Vice Grip
moves.description: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

moves.name: Vine Whip
moves.description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

moves.name: Vital Throw
moves.description: The user attacks last. In return, this throw move never misses.

moves.name: Volt Switch
moves.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

moves.name: Volt Tackle
moves.description: The user electrifies itself, then charges. This also damages the user quite a lot. This may leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Wake-Up Slap
moves.description: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

moves.name: Water Pledge
moves.description: A column of water strikes the target. When combined with its fire equivalent, the damage increases and a rainbow appears.

moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Water Shuriken
moves.description: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Water Sport
moves.description: The user soaks itself with water. This weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.

moves.name: Water Spout
moves.description: The user spouts water to damage opposing Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.

moves.name: Waterfall
moves.description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch. This can also be used to climb a waterfall.

moves.name: Weather Ball
moves.description: An attack move that varies in power and type depending on the weather.

moves.name: Whirlpool
moves.description: The user traps the target in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns.

moves.name: Whirlwind
moves.description: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends the battle against a single Pokémon.

moves.name: Wide Guard
moves.description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn.

moves.name: Wild Charge
moves.description: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. This also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Will-O-Wisp
moves.description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

moves.name: Wing Attack
moves.description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

moves.name: Wish
moves.description: One turn after this move is used, the target’s HP is restored by half the user’s max HP.

moves.name: Withdraw
moves.description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Wonder Room
moves.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

moves.name: Wood Hammer
moves.description: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

moves.name: Work Up
moves.description: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.

moves.name: Worry Seed
moves.description: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target's Ability Insomnia.

moves.name: Wrap
moves.description: A long body or vines are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

moves.name: Wring Out
moves.description: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP the target has, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: X-Scissor
moves.description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

moves.name: Yawn
moves.description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

moves.name: Zap Cannon
moves.description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

moves.name: Zen Headbutt
moves.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Light of Ruin
moves.description: Drawing power from the Eternal Flower, the user fires a powerful beam of light. This also damages the user quite a lot.

moves.name: Hyperspace Hole
moves.description: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right next to the target and strikes. This also hits a target using Protect or Detect.

moves.name: Hyperspace Fury
moves.description: Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect and Detect. This attack lowers the user's Defense.
